name: Baseball Riot
description: Start a baseball riot! Help Gabe Carpaccio take vengeance on the unholy alliance of his former team and a corrupt energy drink manufacturer Explodz Inc. in this fun physics based puzzle game! Baseball Riot is a sequel to Tennis in the Face.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 60 MB available space
